items.title: Add resource
items.explanation: Double-click on blank space in the canvas.

items.title: Add link
items.explanation: Choose the node that is going to be your source. Move mouse to the top right of the node and double-click on 'link'.

items.title: Edit resource name
items.explanation: Double-click on resource name. Enter a new name in the input field and hit Enter.

items.title: Delete resource
items.explanation: Click on the X in the top right of the node. Note that this will also delete all links attached to this node.
